channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bikes parked everywere,lorrys unable to turn into pavillion road, 5th August
item.description:
Bikes left on pavement on resident bays on yelloe lines and in street blocking road.this is every day ,when is something going to be done to stopthis,as a resident parking permit holder will i be getting a refund as bays out side of were i live are being taken by bikes and i am unable to park there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Basil Street, Chelsea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vomit & general mess, 5th August
item.description:
Hi Hackney! This is how I am greeted this week! NIce pile of vomit and the usual Shoreditch weekend detritis. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE can you send someone each week to clean up this alley. I will keep reporting it until you do! Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shoreditch High Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Dangerous tree at corner of Churchyard Row and Brook Drive, 5th August
item.description:
I’ve lost count of how many times I have reported this tree. Branches have started falling. This happens every year. The tree overhangs a cycle route. Someone is going to get hurt. It also self seeds everywhere as you can see from photo. These small trees will continue to grow at a pace and break up the pavement. This has happened before. This tree is costing Southwark Council money, or should I say, my money.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elliott's Row, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive waste causing rats / unsafe walking route, 5th August
item.description:
Hello, Urgent action is needed to address the level of waste building up at the footpath between the cycle path/shared use close to Plumstead Bus Garage and then onto Pettman Crescent. What Three Words: party.reader.over https://what3words.com/party.reader.over This is causing concerns for our staff walking between the bus depot and the vehicle changeover point. It is causing an issue with mice/rats on our premises. We cannot wait for the regeneration project underway to address this - it needs an urgent street cleansing team action please. James Aunger-Third Assistant Operations Manager Plumstead Bus Garage Stagecoach London james.third@stagecoachbus.com 07788 567070

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human excrement in alcove opposite Brenley House, 5th August
